name: files.comments.edit
desc: Edit an existing comment on a file. Only the user who created a comment may make edits. Teams may configure a limited time window during which file comment edits are allowed.

file.desc: File containing the comment to edit.

comment.example: Everyone should take a moment to read this file, seriously.
comment.desc: Text of the comment to edit.

errors.file_not_found: The requested file could not be found.
errors.file_deleted: The requested file was previously deleted.
errors.edit_window_closed: The timeframe for editing the comment has expired.
errors.cant_edit: The requested file could not be found.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.

errors.invalid_form_data: The method was called via a POST request with Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.
errors.invalid_post_type: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/x-www-form-urlencoded multipart/form-data text/plain.
